thread.title: Search for group swept down Waikato River near Lake Taupo
thread.title_full: Search for group swept down Waikato River near Lake Taupo

title: Search for group swept down Waikato River near Lake Taupo
text:
Search for group swept down Waikato River near Lake Taupo Last updated 13:59, February 6 2017 Supplied 
The Aratiatia Rapids north of Taupo where up to four people were swept away on Waitangi Day. 
Up to four people have been swept down the Waikato River near Taupo. 
The group was carried downstream near Aratiatia Dam and the nearby rapids, a 10 minute drive north of Taupo. 
Police are actively searching the area and a helicopter has joined the search after the incident was called in at 12.10pm. 
Ambulance as well as search and rescue teams also responded. 
More soon.
